00020 class ORKatrinFLTEnergyDecoder : public ORVBasicTreeDecoder
00021 {
00022   public:
00023     ORKatrinFLTEnergyDecoder() {}
00024     virtual ~ORKatrinFLTEnergyDecoder() {}
00025 
00026     enum EKatrinFLTEnergyConsts {kNumFLTChannels = 22};
00027     virtual inline UShort_t ChannelOf(UInt_t* record)
00028       { return ( record[4] & 0xFF000000 ) >> 24; }
00029     virtual inline UInt_t SecondsOf(UInt_t* record) { return record[2]; }
00030     virtual inline UInt_t SubSecondsOf(UInt_t* record) { return record[3]; }
00031     virtual inline UInt_t ChannelMapOf(UInt_t* record) 
00032       { return (record[4] & 0x3FFFFF); }
00033     virtual inline UInt_t EventIDOf(UInt_t* record) 
00034       { return ( record[5] & 0x3FF ); }
00035     virtual inline UInt_t PageNumberOf(UInt_t* record) 
00036       { return ( record[5] & 0x1FF0000 ) >> 16; }
00037     virtual inline UInt_t EnergyOf(UInt_t* record) { return record[6]; }
00038     virtual inline UInt_t ResetSecondsOf(UInt_t* record) { return record[7]; }
00039     virtual inline UInt_t ResetSubSecondsOf(UInt_t* record) { return record[8]; }
00040 
00041     // for basic trees
00042     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 6; }
00043     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00044     virtual size_t GetNRows(UInt_t* /*record*/) { return 1; }
00045     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/);
00046 
00047     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORKatrinFLTModel:KatrinFLT"; }
